title: F.C. Fiorentino
text:
F.C. Fiorentino is a <a href="San%20Marino">Sanmarinese</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club, based in <a href="Fiorentino">Fiorentino</a>. The club was founded in <a href="1974%20in%20association%20football">1974</a>. Fiorentino currently plays in "Girone A" of <a href="Campionato%20Sammarinese%20di%20Calcio">Campionato Sammarinese di Calcio</a>. The team's colors are blue and red.
Until the 2004–05 season the club was known as S.S. Montevito.
